   19: %%
   20: -module(cfg_error_9_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   27: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   28: %% Info = [tuple()]
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{timetrap,{seconds,2}}].
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   35: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   36: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   37: %% Reason = term()
   38: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   44: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     ok.
   48: 
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   51: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   52: %% GroupName = atom()
   53: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   54: %% Reason = term()
   55: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   61: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   62: %% GroupName = atom()
   63: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   70: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   71: %% TestCase = atom()
   72: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   73: %% Reason = term()
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: init_per_testcase(tc1, Config) ->
   76:     exit(tc1_should_be_skipped),
   77:     Config;
   78: init_per_testcase(tc2, Config) ->
   79:     ct:comment("init_per_testcase(tc2) timeout"),
   80:     ct:sleep(5000),
   81:     Config;
   82: init_per_testcase(tc3, Config) ->
   83:     badmatch = ?config(void, Config),
   84:     Config;
   85: init_per_testcase(tc4, _) ->
   86:     ok;
   87: init_per_testcase(tc7, _) ->
   88:     {fail,tc7_should_be_failed};
   89: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   90:     Config.
   91: 
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   94: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   95: %% TestCase = atom()
   96: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   97: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   98: end_per_testcase(tc11, _Config) ->
   99:     ct:comment("A warning should be printed"),
  100:     exit(warning_should_be_printed);
  101: end_per_testcase(tc12, _Config) ->
  102:     ct:comment("A warning should be printed"),
  103:     ct:sleep(5000);
  104: end_per_testcase(tc13, Config) ->
  105:     ct:comment("A warning should be printed"),
  106:     badmatch = ?config(void, Config);
  107: end_per_testcase(tc14, Config) ->
  108:     ok = ?config(tc_status, Config),
  109:     {fail,tc14_should_be_failed};
  110: end_per_testcase(tc15, Config) ->
  111:     exit(kaboom);
  112: end_per_testcase(tc16, Config) ->
  113:     ct:sleep(5000);
  114: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  115:     done.
  116: 
  117: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  118: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
  119: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  120: %% GroupName = atom()
  121: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  122: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  123: %% TestCase = atom()
  124: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  125: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  126: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  127: %% N = integer() | forever
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  129: groups() ->
  130:     [].
  131: 
  132: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  133: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  134: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  135: %% GroupName = atom()
  136: %% TestCase = atom()
  137: %% Reason = term()
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: all() -> 
  140:     [tc1,tc2,tc3,tc4,tc5,tc6,tc7,
  141:      tc11,tc12,tc13,tc14,tc15,tc16].
  142: 
  143: tc1(_) ->
  144:     fini.
  145: tc2(_) ->
  146:     fini.
  147: tc3(_) ->
  148:     fini.
  149: tc4(_) ->
  150:     fini.
  151: 
  152: 
  153: tc5() ->
  154:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  155: 	fun(init_tc, _Default) -> {fail,fail_this_testcase};
  156: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  157: 	end),
  158:     [].
  159: 		
  160: tc5(_) ->
  161:     ct:comment("This one should get failed by init_tc!"),
  162:     fini.
  163: 
  164: tc6() ->
  165:     put('$test_server_framework_test',
  166: 	fun(end_tc, _Default) -> {fail,fail_this_testcase};
  167: 	   (_, Default) -> Default
  168: 	end),
  169:     [].
  170: 
  171: tc6(_) ->
  172:     ct:comment("This one should succeed but then get failed by end_tc!"),
  173:     fini.
  174: 
  175: tc7(_) ->
  176:     ct:comment("This one should get failed by iptc!"),
  177:     fini.
  178: 
  179: 
  180: tc11(_) ->
  181:     fini.
  182: tc12(_) ->
  183:     ct:comment("It's ok if this doesn't get printed"),
  184:     fini.
  185: tc13(_) ->
  186:     fini.
  187: tc14(_) ->
  188:     ct:comment("This one should be failed by eptc"),
  189:     yes.
  190: tc15(_) ->
  191:     exit(this_error_must_show).
  192: tc16(_) ->
  193:     exit(this_error_must_show).
